title: Pixel 2 stuck in boot loop and can't access recovery mode
content:
I was using my phone when the battery died, upon putting it on charge it has entered a boot loop showing the google screen then switching off.  

I have tried entering recovery mode, power and down volume, using the volume button select recovery mode then power button and tapping the up volume once, this just causes a few lines to appear across the screen then shows the white google screen and enters the bootloop again.

The device is not recognized when connected via usb to the computer, I have downloaded latest drivers, adb devices lists no device.

At the moment I have a Pixel brick, does anyone have any ideas?

Thank you.
